General.Name: Wuchan Zhongda Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuchan Zhongda Group Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides bulk commodity supply chain integration services in China and internationally. The company offers industrial, equity, asset, and investment management; management and information consulting services, domestic trade, import and export business, car sales and leasing supply chain management, logistics and warehousing information services; house and equipment leasing; and property services, elderly care, health care, and health services. It also provides financial services, combined heat and power generation, water environmental protection, medical health, wire and cable, stainless steel, and motor core manufacturing, etc. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

1.Name: Ms. Qiying  Wang
1.Title: Financial Director & Head of Accounting Department
